activities: We collect personal and nonpersonal information about you, your business, and your customer(s) in order to (i) register you to use the company's services, (ii) provide, maintain and improve the services, (iii) process your order or inquiries, (iv) diagnose or fix technology problems, (v) control unauthorized use or abuse of the services, or otherwise detect, investigate or prevent activities that may violate our policies or be illegal, (vi) analyze trends, administer or optimize the services, monitor usage or traffic patterns, and gather demographic information about our user base as a whole, (vii) deliver customer service, (viii) communicate directly with you about the services, and (ix) otherwise comply with governmental, legislative, and regulatory bodies' requests as necessary.  You submit such information to us when you set up your account and when you add your customers' information to enable delivery of invoices.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online customer data which is not manually processed
